text: Jeremy Dale (November 22, 1979 â€“ November 3, 2014) was an American comic book artist. He was best known for his work on G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero. He also worked on the 2008 Harvey Award-winning Popgun v.1 from Image Comics. He worked mostly as a penciller and inker. Dale was born in 1980 in Indiana. He was married to Kelly and lived in Atlanta, Georgia. Dale, who had been hospitalized, died on November 4, 2014 at the age of 34. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980s births Category:2014 deaths Category:American comics artists Category:People from Atlanta Category:People from Indiana
title: Jeremy Dale
